averzian.title: Imperator Averzian
averzian.blackening_desc: Max HP Debuff. Swap on every Shadow's Advance.
averzian.positioning_desc: Keep boss away from Dark Tears (the +75% dmg buff is deadly).
averzian.umbral_desc: Aim impact at a Voidshaper to break its shield.
averzian.big_heals_desc: During Umbral Collapse soak explosion (6s ticking dot).
averzian.dark_upheaval_desc: Constant periodic damage on the whole raid.
averzian.desolation_desc: Watch players soaking already captured zones.
averzian.rule_2_3_desc: Raid can destroy 2 adds via soaks; the 3rd will always capture its zone.
averzian.utility_desc: DKs (Grips) and stuns are crucial for Voidmaw at 35% HP.
averzian.gathering_desc: Kill the Voidshaper before it reaches 100 energy (Wipe).
averzian.bloodlust_desc: On Pull. Blast the boss before the room is full.
averzian.grid_management_desc: The raid can destroy 2 adds per wave via Tank soaks. The 3rd will capture its zone.
averzian.priority_desc: Prioritize blocking zones that threaten to form a line of 3 (Tic-Tac-Toe).
averzian.forces_desc: Averzian never fights alone. He summons his armies via **Void Rifts** and **Dark Tears**.

vorasius.title: Vorasius
vorasius.smashed_desc: Swap on every Smashing Frenzy. The +150% physical dmg debuff is deadly.
vorasius.aftershock_desc: Stand in the center of impact after explosion to avoid rings.
vorasius.primordial_roar_desc: Soft enrage. The Gathering Void DoT stacks on every cast.
vorasius.parasite_expulsion_desc: Massive raid damage spike when adds spawn.
vorasius.dispels_desc: Dispel the dmg increase debuff on players hit by add explosions.
vorasius.wall_break_desc: Kill the Blistercreeps ON the crystal walls (Heroic: 2 per wall).
vorasius.void_breath_desc: Watch which hand glows to anticipate the sweep start side.
vorasius.utility_desc: Use Grips / Typhoons / Rings of Peace to bring adds to walls.
vorasius.bloodlust_desc: On Pull. Take advantage of the relative calm to burn the boss.
vorasius.wall_break_tactics_desc: The key mechanic. Blistercreeps MUST die **on** a crystal wall.
vorasius.anticipation_desc: Watch Vorasius' glowing hand to know where Void Breath starts.
vorasius.pression_desc: Vorasius slams the ground regularly, dealing heavy physical damage and stunning the raid for 2 seconds.
vorasius.spawns_desc: Pustules appear on Vorasius' body, bursting to release **Blistercreeps**.

salhadaar.title: Salhadaar
salhadaar.shattering_twilight_desc: Impact spawns spikes. Move away from raid BEFORE impact.
salhadaar.kiting_desc: Move boss away from Concentrated Void orbs to buy time for DPS.
salhadaar.instability_desc: Swap on every Shattering Twilight or when DoT becomes too heavy.
salhadaar.cosmic_unraveling_desc: Burn phase (20s). Massive AOE healing required during beams.
salhadaar.despotic_command_desc: Dispel players ONLY when they are at the edge of the room.
salhadaar.heal_absorb_desc: Heal the player intensely after dispel to clear the absorb.
salhadaar.orb_dot_desc: Do NOT kill orbs at the same time! Let the DoT expire.
salhadaar.focus_orbs_desc: Kill orbs ONE BY ONE. Never kill them simultaneously.
salhadaar.bloodlust_dps_desc: Use BL during Unbound Phase (+25% damage taken by boss).
salhadaar.despotic_dps_desc: If you have the pink circle, run IMMEDIATELY to the room edge.
salhadaar.fractured_images_desc: ABSOLUTE priority on interrupts to avoid filling the room with void.
salhadaar.bloodlust_global_desc: Unbound Phase. Boss takes +25% damage, time to send all burst.
salhadaar.orb_management_desc: Never kill multiple orbs simultaneously (Heroic). Wait for raid DoT to expire.
salhadaar.void_zones_desc: If you have a circle (Despotic Command), place it on edges to keep center clean.
salhadaar.positioning_desc: Tanks, aim Shattering Twilight towards edges to avoid cluttering center.
salhadaar.unbound_desc: Salhadaar gains energy passively. At 100 Energy, he enters **Cosmic Unraveling**.
salhadaar.phase_normal_desc: Pulls Concentrated Void orbs towards him from edges.
salhadaar.phase_normal_strat: Intercept/Kill (One by one in Heroic). Priority on closest orbs.
salhadaar.phase_unbound_desc: At 100 energy, boss takes **+25% damage** for 20 sec.

vaelgor.title: Vaelgor & Ezzorak
vaelgor.alternatance_desc: One boss on ground, the other in air. They swap after intermission.
vaelgor.nullbeam_desc: Aim beam away from raid. Accumulate stacks to reduce Nullzone pull.
vaelgor.placement_tank_desc: NEVER stand behind dragons (Tail Lash / Impale). Keep them >15m apart.
vaelgor.nullsnap_desc: Plan big CDs for tether breaks. This is the major damage spike.
vaelgor.radiant_barrier_desc: Save CDs for Midnight Flames (Intermission). Stay in NPC zone.
vaelgor.targeted_heals_desc: Watch tanks during Nullbeam and targets of Void Howl.
vaelgor.gloom_desc: Rotation of 2 groups of 5 players to soak spheres. Do not soak twice in a row (Diminish).
vaelgor.void_orbs_desc: Absolute priority! Grips, stuns and immediate nukes on these adds.
vaelgor.hp_balance_desc: Bosses must die together (max 10% diff). Focus the ground dragon.
vaelgor.bloodlust_tactics_desc: End of fight or during phase swap if raid is struggling.
vaelgor.separation_desc: Imperatively keep both bosses >15m apart to avoid damage buff.
vaelgor.gloom_rotation_desc: Strictly follow the rotation of 2 groups (5 players each) to soak Gloom zones.
vaelgor.duality_desc: Vaelgor and Ezzorak alternate between active combat and air support phases.
vaelgor.phase_1_desc: One dragon grounded (heavy mechanics), other flying (less active).
vaelgor.phase_1_strat: Focus Grounded: Swap target after each intermission.
vaelgor.intermission_desc: At 100 Energy, both fly up (Midnight Flames).
vaelgor.intermission_strat: Stack Radiant Barrier: Kill fixate add inside the NPC protective zone.
vaelgor.tethering_desc: Dragons share HP but must remain separated.
vaelgor.tethering_strat: Distance: Keep Dragons >15m apart to avoid Twilight Fury.
vaelgor.heroic_support_desc: The support phase dragon casts spells more frequently.
vaelgor.gloomtouched_desc: Stacking debuff dealing constant shadow damage.
vaelgor.lightbound_vanguard_desc: Summon light zones to soak to reduce damage taken.

lightblinded.title: Lightblinded Vanguard
lightblinded.taunt_swap_desc: Swap targets immediately on Judgment (Bellamy or Lightblood) to avoid Final Verdict one-shot.
lightblinded.placement_desc: Keep bosses at room edge. Move them out of Consecration zones (Heroic).
lightblinded.aura_devotion_desc: If Bellamy casts his aura, move the other two bosses out of the zone (75% DR).
lightblinded.tyrs_wrath_desc: Massive emergency healing required on targets (healing absorb). Use CDs here.
lightblinded.aura_peace_desc: Do not heal/hit Senn inside his blue aura, or you will be pacified.
lightblinded.execution_sentence_desc: Plan raid CDs for split-soaks (Lightblood's Hammer).
lightblinded.focus_senn_desc: Kill the healer (Senn) first. Break his Sacred Shield to interrupt the cast.
lightblinded.aura_dodge_desc: Dodge Bellamy's shields (Divine Toll) which silence for 5s.
lightblinded.bloodlust_dps_desc: Wait for Forbearance (2:30-3:00) to avoid boss immunity windows.
lightblinded.bloodlust_global_desc: Wait for Forbearance (around 2m30-3m) to avoid boss immunity windows.
lightblinded.target_priority_desc: Kill **War Chaplain Senn** first. His heals and shields are the most dangerous.
lightblinded.sacred_shield_desc: Destroy Senn's shield immediately to interrupt his Blinding Light cast.
lightblinded.three_commanders_desc: The encounter consists of three commanders with synergistic abilities. Aura management is key.
lightblinded.senn_action: Action: Nuke shield, interrupt Blinding Light.
lightblinded.lightblood_management: Management: Split-soak orange zones, dodge hammers.
lightblinded.bellamy_dodge: Dodge: Watch Bellamy and dodge flying shields.
lightblinded.holy_zeal_desc: In Heroic, bosses leave consecration zones and use auras more violently.
lightblinded.consecration_desc: Each boss drops a holy fire zone after their Aura phase.
lightblinded.zealous_spirit_desc: A random boss gains +30% damage. Focus switch required.

chimaerus.title: Chimaerus
chimaerus.alndust_desc: Group soak on Tank! Split raid into 2 groups (G1+G3 then G2+G4).
chimaerus.colossal_horror_desc: Tank adds in the Aln. Beware of Colossal Strikes.
chimaerus.insatiable_desc: Always keep the boss away from manifestations (or he eats them).
chimaerus.rift_sickness_desc: Absorbs next X healing per stack. More adds = more stacks!
chimaerus.consuming_miasma_desc: Strategic dispel to clear Alndust pools.
chimaerus.adds_priority_desc: Break Alnshrouds in the Aln, then finish adds in Reality before they reach the boss.
chimaerus.interrupts_desc: Fearsome Cry (fear) and Essence Bolt on Haunting Essence.
chimaerus.stacking_desc: Kill adds grouped up to minimize Alndust pools.
chimaerus.bloodlust_global_desc: On Pull, Phase 1. Maximize damage on boss while adds are manageable.
chimaerus.soak_rotation_desc: Groups 1+3 take first Alndust Upheaval, then G2+4 next. Alternate each Phase 1.
chimaerus.adds_stacking_desc: Kill manifestations in the same spot to limit Alndust Essence pools.
chimaerus.consume_timer_desc: All adds MUST be dead before boss reaches 100 energy.
chimaerus.phase_1_desc: Chimaerus summons **Manifestations** in the **Aln** realm. Only players with *Alnsight* (from soak) can attack them.
chimaerus.alndust_upheaval_table: Soak on Tank. Shared damage, grants Alnsight (40s).
chimaerus.alndust_upheaval_action: Group soak: ~10 players to split damage.
chimaerus.consume_effect: At 100 energy: knockback + eats all remaining adds.
chimaerus.consume_action: All adds must be dead! Otherwise +100% dmg/stack.
chimaerus.rending_tear_action: Avoid being in front of boss (except tanks).
chimaerus.consuming_miasma_effect: 1min DoT on targeted players. Dispel clears pools.
chimaerus.rift_madness_effect: Players in Aln must be 'grounded' by someone in Reality.
chimaerus.rift_madness_action: Realm swap: Stand under affected players.
chimaerus.dissonance_effect: Damage to all players in opposite realm within 8m.
chimaerus.manifestations_desc: Adds spawn in the **Aln** with a shield. Once broken, they fall into **Reality** and walk towards the boss.
chimaerus.colossal_horror_effect: Discordant Roar (+10% dmg/cast). Colossal Strikes (physical + nature).
chimaerus.colossal_horror_action: High priority. Tank add, kill fast. Roar stacks!
chimaerus.haunting_essence_effect: Fearsome Cry (3s fear). Essence Bolt (random damage).
chimaerus.haunting_essence_action: Interrupt Fearsome Cry and Essence Bolt!
chimaerus.swarming_shade_action: Cleave/AoE. Group them to kill together.
chimaerus.phase_2_desc: Boss takes flight and bombards raid with *Corrupted Devastation*. Breaths are **baitable**!
chimaerus.corrupted_devastation_effect: Line breath on players. Leaves pools + spawns adds.
chimaerus.corrupted_devastation_action: Bait the lines! Stack to overlap them.
chimaerus.alndust_essence_action: Avoid. Use Miasma dispels to clear.
chimaerus.ravenous_dive_effect: Boss lands, knockback + eats remaining adds.
chimaerus.ravenous_dive_action: Kill ALL adds before the dive!
chimaerus.ravenous_dive_heroic_effect: Does not consume Alndust pools automatically.
chimaerus.group_rotation_desc: G1+G3 soak 1st Upheaval ‚Üí go to Aln to kill adds.
chimaerus.baiting_phase_2_desc: Stack to bait breaths in same spot ‚Üí more safe space.

midnight.title: Midnight Raid Guide - Larias

tldr.early_access: Early Access: Leveling + Professions only. Spend nothing.
tldr.sandbag: Sandbagging: Do NOT spend Heroic Crests in Week 1. Save them to upgrade Mythic items in Week 2.
tldr.tokens: Tokens: Omnitoken available Week 3 (Last Boss). Catalyst (charges) unlocked Week 1.
tldr.sparks: Crafting: 2 Embellishments available Week 1. 246 ilvl crafting possible immediately with correct crests.

alert.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Update Feb 13 - Important
alert.li1: I wanted to update the guide with more precise info, but less than 2 weeks from Early Access, we still have no official information from Blizzard regarding updated reward systems.
alert.li2: Consequently, I am updating this guide with my best estimates based on available content.
alert.li3: What we don't know: Exact crafting/upgrade costs, exact Early Access content (which crests/delves?), how sparks work, raid renown, turbo boost, etc.
alert.li4: I will update this guide as soon as we have more information.

intro.structure_desc: Blizzard returns to the Mist/Cata era with a tier split between multiple raids and a staggered release:
intro.w1: Week 1: LFR, Normal, Heroic for Voidspire (6 bosses) and Dreamrift (1 boss). M0 available.
intro.w2: Week 2: Mythic for these raids + M+ unlocked.
intro.w3: Week 3: March on Quel‚Äôdanas (2 bosses) opens in all difficulties. Contains the Omni-Token and the hardest bosses.
intro.crests_li1: Track-Specific: Crests are now track-specific. 'Hero track' items require ONLY Heroic crests, 'Mythic track' items require ONLY Mythic crests.
intro.crests_li2: No More Valorstones! Replaced by a minimal gold cost.
intro.crests_li3: Champion Track Nerf: Reduced to 6 ranks. A 6/6 Champion item is equivalent to a 2/6 Hero item.
intro.crests_li4:
Progressive Costs: The cost increases at each tier.
1/6 -> 2/6 = 10 crests
2/6 -> 3/6 = 20 crests
3/6 -> 4/6 = 30 crests...
Full update = 150 crests (vs 75 before).
intro.crests_li5: Cap: Increased to 100 (instead of 90), but overall progression is slower.
intro.upgrade_li1: Heroic Crests useful: Even late in the tier, you can update your remaining 4/6 Hero pieces for small gains.
intro.upgrade_li2: Weapons: 1H and 2H weapons (non-crafted) have become a bad option in raid/vault due to the exorbitant cost to max them (50 crests for the last rank).
intro.upgrade_li3:
Crafting OP: Crafting a 5/6 item costs 60 crests (60% of the weekly cap). Upgrading a dropped item from 1/6 to 5/6 costs 100 crests.
Conclusion: Do not waste your crests upgrading a slot you plan to craft!

systems.title: New Systems
systems.tokens_li1: Tokens are separated by armor type AND by raid (Prefix 'Aln-' for Dreamrift, 'Void-' for Voidspire).
systems.tokens_li2: The Omnitoken arrives only in Week 3.
systems.tokens_li3: Important: Once the 4-set is obtained, ALL content can drop catalyst charges. Doing LFR to grab pieces quickly is therefore very profitable to unlock this.
systems.prey_li1: Prey: New system sharing the 'Weekly Heroic' reward with Delves. Delves will likely remain superior for farming crests.
systems.prey_li2: Consumables: Return of classics + a new 'Crit Damage' ring enchant and an embellishment doubling JC trinket effects.
systems.prey_li3: Renown: No raid renown apparently. Mainly useful for profession recipes.

sandbag.title: Why 'Sandbag' (Hoard Crests)?
sandbag.desc1: Blizzard directly incentivizes players to 'sandbag' (not spend) their equipment to gain power later.
sandbag.desc2: The golden rule (unless Top 100 guild): Spend ZERO heroic crests until the end of the Week 3 reclear.
sandbag.li1: If you upgrade an item in Week 1 or 2, there is a high chance it will be replaced by a Mythic drop or Vault, wasting your precious crests.
sandbag.li2: Heroic crests remain useful for a long time (until week 8+), do not throw them out the window.
sandbag.li3: Exception: BiS Hero Trinkets that you will keep throughout progress.

ea.title: Early Access (Feb 26 - Mar 3)
ea.quote: "Midnight Early Access is Pay to Win if you do not have unlimited time."
ea.li1: Level every character you plan to play. M0s will be available at reset, so be ready.
ea.li4: Crafters/Renown: Minimize side quests until Sunday to benefit from the DMF bonus.

pre_w1.title: Pre-Season Week 1 (Mar 3)
pre_w1.subtitle: M0 available (reduced ilvl)
pre_w1.li2: Unlock Tier 8 Delves (or 11 if available) and farm for gear ?? and crests.
pre_w1.li4: Do World Quests that give upgrades.
pre_w1.li5: M0 World Tour: On every char. Drops 3/6 Veteran (240 ilvl). DO NOT upgrade these items.
pre_w1.li6: If you are a crafter/interested in Renown: Do Loremaster with DMF bonus.

pre_w2.title: Pre-Season Week 2 (Mar 10)
pre_w2.subtitle: M0 available (reduced ilvl)
pre_w2.li2: Continue: Tier 8+ Delves, Prey, World Quests.
pre_w2.li3: Full M0 World Tour (3/6 Veteran 240 ilvl).
pre_w2.li4_sub1: You can craft 246 ilvl pieces in 3-5 slots (Bracers, Belt, Boots) using 60x Veteran Dawncrests each.
pre_w2.li4_sub2: Put 2x Embellishments for the power boost in raid.
pre_w2.li4_sub3: If you do not raid on Tuesday or have time to do M0s the following week, WAIT.

s1_w1.title: Week 1 - Heroic Week (Mar 17) - No M+
s1_w1.subtitle: M0 available (Full ilvl)
s1_w1.li1: DO NOT SPEND HEROIC OR MYTHIC CRESTS.
s1_w1.li2: LFR: Do it for set pieces (Tier). Reason: unlock the catalyst.
s1_w1.li4: World Boss: Kill it for a 2/6 Champion item (250 ilvl).
s1_w1.li5: PvP: Do the quest for a guaranteed Hero track item (do not upgrade it). Note: Disappeared from beta, to be verified.
s1_w1.li6: Delves: High level Bountiful Delves with keys.
s1_w1.li7_sub1: Craft 246 ilvl (Bracer/Belt/Boots) with 2x Embellishments if not done.
s1_w1.li7_sub2: Fill empty slots with 233 ilvl (Adventurer Dawncrests).
s1_w1.li8: Spend Crests: You can spend NON-Heroic/Mythic crests for temporary upgrades (Trinkets).
s1_w1.li9: Raid: Clear as much Normal and Heroic as possible.

s1_w2.title: Week 2 - Mythic Week (Mar 24) - M+ Open
s1_w2.desc: (The week you should take time off)
s1_w2.li1: M+: Farm +10s for 3/6 Hero (266 ilvl), vault slots and ALL your crests.
s1_w2.li2: If +10s are too hard, do +8s for 2/6 Hero.
s1_w2.li3: Crest Upgrades: DO NOT SPEND HEROIC OR MYTHIC CRESTS.
s1_w2.li4: Mythic Loot Exception: If you are lucky enough to loot a Mythic item in raid, you can upgrade it twice without affecting the strategy (just adjust the following).
s1_w2.li5: Raid: Full clear Normal, Heroic, and start of Mythic!

w3.title: Week 3 - Final Raid Opens (Mar 31)
w3.li1: Vault: Open for a Myth track item 272+. Upgrade it AFTER crafting.
w3.li2:
Crafting: Craft a 2H Mythic weapon at 5/6 (285 ilvl) for 60 Myth Crests (unless your class discord says otherwise).
Why? Because dropped weapons cost too much to upgrade.
w3.li3: LFR: If you don't have 4p, do LFR.
w3.li6_title: Spend Heroic Crests (FINALLY): BEFORE mythic prog, spend your heroic crests.
w3.li6_sub1: Upgrade as many items as possible from 3/6 (266) to 4/6 (269).
w3.li6_sub2: Each upgrade costs 30 crests => 10 items total.
w3.li6_sub3: LEAVE a ring, a trinket, and the slot you plan to craft in 2 weeks non-upgraded.
w3.li7: Mythic Upgrades: Upgrade your Vault item 1/6 -> 4/6 (282 ilvl) for 60 crests.

w4.title: Week 4 (Apr 7)
w4.li3: Assume you got 1 Mythic Loot piece (2/6 276 ilvl) in your first 2 raid weeks.
w4.li4:
Heroic Upgrades: Upgrade 2 of your remaining 3/6 items to 4/6 (60 crests). Upgrade ONE 4/6 item to 5/6 (40 crests).
Prefer upgrading a Hero trinket or ring that you won't replace anytime soon.

w5.title: Week 5 (Apr 14)
w5.li2: Crafting: Craft your 2nd Mythic item 5/6 (285) for 60 mythic crests. Prefer a slot where you have a Heroic item.
w5.li3: Heroic Upgrades: Upgrade two 4/6 items -> 5/6 (80 Crests). Try to choose items unlikely to be replaced by vault.
